data.author: Margaret Mead
data.text: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.

data.author: Steven Wright
data.text: If at first, you don't succeed, then skydiving definitely isn't for you.

data.author: Will Ferrell
data.text: Before you marry a person, you should first make them use a computer with slow internet to see who they really are.

data.author: Bill Watterson
data.text: The surest sign that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe is that it has never tried to contact us.
